sense.def:
To crush an object
pomeni močno stisniti neki predmet, tako da ga zlomimo ali uničimo njegovo obliko.

To crush a substance
pomeni neko snov spremeniti v prah tako, da jo stisnemo in zmeljemo.

seg.quote: To get the oil out you will have to crush the seeds.

sense.def:
To crush an army or a political organization
pomeni dokončno premagati neko vojsko ali politično organizacijo.

seg.quote: The government still think they can crush the unions.

sense.def:
A crush
je nagnetena množica ljudi.

seg.quote: A reporter made his way through the crush.

sense.def:
To have a crush on someone
pomeni, da nas nekdo kratek čas močno privlači;

cit.quote: biti zaljubljen, biti nor na koga, biti zatrapan

seg.quote: I had a crush on the violin master.
